**Gemma Gerber, Tinotenda Mangadze** and **Ben Brooker** presented at the joint ECSA 58 and EMECS 13 on network science and estuarine ecology in September.

**Tinotenda** received the National Wetlands Award 2021, category Young Professional - congratulations! Check the interview [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wKbY1YzlKvU).
